name: Phantasmal Wanderer
description:
You are a wizard that rules an almighty land, but you still have to send minions out on quests ‘cause you're too cheap to reward adventurers. Even minions need constant watching over to get the job done, ‘cause they're too lazy to move their bum unless their life is in immediate danger. So instead of spending huge magical energy to summon real things, you use illusions that briefly interact with the physical world.

How To Play:

You are the wizard who is trying to get your minion back home, the way you do this is by placing objects to distract or get around obstacle.  You can place two different ramps, two different blocks and a cake.  You can only have 4 objects placed at a time.  You have to work around this and get you minion home.  

Controls:

Mouse to place objects.

1, 2, 3, 4, 5 and 6 are the hot-bar hotkeys.

Esc to pause.

Install instructions:

Download the .Zip file and unzip it, then run the executable.

We do not retain the rights to any audio assets, we retain all rights to all visual assets.
